title: Tesla expands production in Berlin
text: Tesla is ramping up production at its Giga Berlin factory, aiming for 5000 cars per week. The expansion comes amidst high demand in the European market.

title: Tesla faces new regulatory challenges in China
text: New safety regulations in China may impact Tesla's autopilot features. Authorities are requesting more data transparency from EV manufacturers.

title: Analyst upgrades TSLA price target
text: Leading analysts have upgraded TSLA price target to $300 citing strong Q3 delivery numbers and improved margins.
